A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a star wars fan from being a child this has crushed me. I feel lost with the future of this franchise and I don't care about any of the characters AT ALL. The comedy didn't work\, the plot wasnt believable and by the way- if you took out the rose and Finn story it wouldn't make any difference. The whole thing felt like a Disney film\, NOT A STAR WARS FILM. This is the worst film of the series and I don't think Rian Johnson can save this\, and he's destroyed the franchise for a lot of people. Being set to do more in the future worries me as there are SO MANY PLOT HOLES. Most of the action sequences were fantastic and I loved the lightsaber battles... When there were some\, but overall I felt as a star wars fan we were ignored and crushed. This is not how you should feel after a huge blockbuster film!! If you're a casual filmgoer then you'll probably enjoy this\, if you're a die hard fan like me prepare to be disappointed overall.
